alert.note: Alert for West Central Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 31 at 1:51AM MDT until April 01 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 PM MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow and areas of blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 9 inches, except 7 to 14 inches above 7000 ft. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph will create areas of blowing and drifting snow Saturday. * WHERE...West Central Mountains zone. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 6 PM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will continue in this area Saturday night and Sunday, but with a lower intensity and with weaker winds.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
